description:
This home is closest to The Manhattan FREE ferry, (a 10 minute walk), city bus stops, (2 minute walk) and the new NY Ferris Wheel (2017). You’ll love this private home because of the location, the ambiance, the outdoors space, and the very safe neighborhood. My place is good for couples, business travelers, and families (with kids). We are required by New York  We are required by New York City law to charge you sales tax and room tax which is to be paid directly to the host prior to arrival.

This is an 1870 Victorian with many antiques. The kitchen is modern and fully equipped. The beds and sofa bed are new and we supply all the linens, towels and paper products you will need.

You will have the entire apartment, your own front door with no sharing except for the front foyer. You have your own keys and may arrive anytime to access the keys from a lock box.
name: Great Location for Families 2 Bedroom Private Home
